divs: Sighting DetailsThis sighting was many, many years ago but I can still remember the sighting pretty well itself, I just don't remember the exact date or time and I'm just now reporting this. It was early evening between 5 or 6 PM I believe, and I was riding home with my mother. It was a cloudless day and the sun was behind me and the sky was just starting to turn pink. When we were almost home I looked up to my right and at the sky and I noticed a light. This light just floated in one spot and flickered for maybe just over a second and flickered out. At first I thought it was maybe lights reflecting off a plane or something until the very next day. The very next day I look at the same area of the sky at about the same time of day and I saw the light again but this time there were two other lights with it and they floated(or hovered i don't know) for maybe just a few seconds and they, like the first light just flickered until they disappeared but I think the strangest part about these lights is that they were in formation. They made a triangle formation but it was easy to tell this wasn't one big object but 3 lights because the light went through in between them. I wish I had more details but that's all i can spare.
